trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There were no other sightings in Edmonton on or around July 25th 2010
Summary: Star like changing position and brightness.
divs: Sighting DetailsI have noticed this object that looks like a star however it changed its location and brightness. When I used the cam coder zoom It looked like two spherical objects attached. The object looked totally like a star so I did not really care much. It stayed in the east side of the sky. However, yesterday the object brightness was changing from very bright for few minutes then the light diminish to almost nothing for few seconds then it gets bright. The object seemed to move while there is no light. Today I believe I saw the same bright object however in a different location in the sky without the change in brightness as yesterday.
